configuration.stem: Mendel studied seven different features of pea plants including flower color, seed shape, and seed color. Describe the evidence Mendel used to determine if a particular trait was dominant or recessive.
configuration.teacherAnswer: Answers should include that Mendel would cross the truebreeding parent plants. The trait that appeared in the F1 generation was the dominant trait. The recessive trait would reappear in the F2 generation.
